title._content: Image taken from page 127 of 'History of Concord, New Hampshire, from the original grant in seventeen hundred and twenty-five to the opening of the twentieth century. Prepared under the supervision of the City History Commission. James O. Lyford, editor'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Concord, New Hampshire, from the original grant in seventeen hundred and twenty-five to the opening of the twentieth century.
